description:
-- TouchPad version with 25% discount --
iWorld Atlas is the reference atlas and is now available for TouchPad.
The most Complete and Interactive World Atlas. Whatever you are an economist, a globe-trotter, VIP, student, ... , iWorld Atlas is the most complete atlas of 9 Continents, 5 Oceans and the 224 countries which have a political and economic activity. iWorld Atlas features more than 7840 key facts and 460 large and high detailed maps. In addition iWorld Atlas allows you to display:
- Large map for each continent
- World Time Zone
- Key fatcs of the 5 Oceans
- Google map plugin
- Country physical map (elevation, ...)
- Country political map (cities, ...)
- Flag and coat of arms description and origin
- Conversion tables (weight, Lenght, Area, Speed, Sizes, ...)
- ... and much more ...
